post.summary: CreateDownloadLocation creates a signed url to download artifacts.
post.description: Creates a read-only http location that is accessible for tasks at runtime.

get.summary: CreateDownloadLocation creates a signed url to download artifacts.
get.description: Deprecated: Please use CreateDownloadLink instead. Creates a read-only http location that is accessible for tasks at runtime.

parameters.name: native_url
parameters.description: NativeUrl specifies the url in the format of the configured storage provider (e.g. s3://my-bucket/randomstring/suffix.tar).

parameters.name: expires_in
parameters.description:
ExpiresIn defines a requested expiration duration for the generated url. The request will be rejected if this
exceeds the platform allowed max.
+optional. The default value comes from a global config.

post.summary: CreateUploadLocation creates a signed url to upload artifacts to for a given project/domain.
post.description: Creates a write-only http location that is accessible for tasks at runtime.

coreNodeExecutionIdentifier.description: Encapsulation of fields that identify a Flyte node execution entity.

project.description: Name of the project the resource belongs to.

domain.description:
Name of the domain the resource belongs to.
A domain can be considered as a subset within a specific project.

name.description: User or system provided value for the resource.

coreWorkflowExecutionIdentifier.title: Encapsulation of fields that uniquely identifies a Flyte workflow execution

serviceArtifactType.description:
- ARTIFACT_TYPE_UNDEFINED: ARTIFACT_TYPE_UNDEFINED is the default, often invalid, value for the enum.
 - ARTIFACT_TYPE_DECK: ARTIFACT_TYPE_DECK refers to the deck html file optionally generated after a task, a workflow or a launch plan
finishes executing.
serviceArtifactType.title: ArtifactType

expires_in.description:
ExpiresIn defines a requested expiration duration for the generated url. The request will be rejected if this
exceeds the platform allowed max.
+optional. The default value comes from a global config.

node_execution_id.description:
NodeId is the unique identifier for the node execution. For a task node, this will retrieve the output of the
most recent attempt of the task.

serviceCreateDownloadLinkRequest.title: CreateDownloadLinkRequest defines the request parameters to create a download link (signed url)

signed_url.title: SignedUrl specifies the url to use to download content from (e.g. https://my-bucket.s3.amazonaws.com/randomstring/suffix.tar?X-...)

expires_at.description: ExpiresAt defines when will the signed URL expire.

serviceCreateDownloadLinkResponse.title: CreateDownloadLinkResponse defines the response for the generated links

signed_url.title: SignedUrl specifies the url to use to download content from (e.g. https://my-bucket.s3.amazonaws.com/randomstring/suffix.tar?X-...)

expires_at.description: ExpiresAt defines when will the signed URL expires.

project.title:
Project to create the upload location for
+required

domain.title:
Domain to create the upload location for.
+required

filename.description:
Filename specifies a desired suffix for the generated location. E.g. `file.py` or `pre/fix/file.zip`.
+optional. By default, the service will generate a consistent name based on the provided parameters.

expires_in.description:
ExpiresIn defines a requested expiration duration for the generated url. The request will be rejected if this
exceeds the platform allowed max.
+optional. The default value comes from a global config.

content_md5.title:
ContentMD5 restricts the upload location to the specific MD5 provided. The ContentMD5 will also appear in the
generated path.
+required

serviceCreateUploadLocationRequest.description: CreateUploadLocationRequest specified request for the CreateUploadLocation API.

signed_url.title: SignedUrl specifies the url to use to upload content to (e.g. https://my-bucket.s3.amazonaws.com/randomstring/suffix.tar?X-...)

native_url.title: NativeUrl specifies the url in the format of the configured storage provider (e.g. s3://my-bucket/randomstring/suffix.tar)

expires_at.description: ExpiresAt defines when will the signed URL expires.
